Enum Class YahtzeeCategory

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<YahtzeeCategory>
yahtzee.YahtzeeCategory
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<YahtzeeCategory>, Constable
public enum YahtzeeCategory extends Enum<YahtzeeCategory>
This enum represents the different scoring categories in Yahtzee and provides methods to calculate the score for each category based on the dice rolled.

    • calculateScore

      public int calculateScore(int[] dice)
      Calculates the score for the given category based on the rolled dice.
      Parameters:
      dice - - An array of integers representing the values of the rolled dice.
      Returns:
      The calculated score for the category.

    • sumOfDice

      private int sumOfDice(int[] dice, int value, int ofAKind, HashMap<Integer,Integer> counts)
      Sums the values of the dice based on the specified criteria.
      Parameters:
      dice - - An array of integers representing the values of the rolled dice.
      value - - The specific die value to sum (0 to sum all).
      ofAKind - - The number of identical dice required (3 or 4) or 0 for no requirement.
      counts - - A HashMap containing the counts of each die value.
      Returns:
      The calculated sum based on the criteria.

    • checkOfAKind

      private boolean checkOfAKind(int[] dice, int ofAKind, HashMap<Integer,Integer> counts)
      Checks if there are at least 'ofAKind' identical dice in the roll.
      Parameters:
      dice - - An array of integers representing the values of the rolled dice.
      ofAKind - - The number of identical dice required (3 or 4).
      counts - - A HashMap containing the counts of each die value.
      Returns:
      True if the condition is met, false otherwise.

    • checkFullHouse

      private int checkFullHouse(int[] dice, HashMap<Integer,Integer> counts)
      Checks if the roll is a full house (a pair and a three of a kind).
      Parameters:
      dice - - An array of integers representing the values of the rolled dice.
      counts - - A HashMap containing the counts of each die value.
      Returns:
      25 if it's a full house, 0 otherwise.

    • checkStraight

      private int checkStraight(int[] dice, int straight)
      Checks for small or large straights in the roll.
      Parameters:
      dice - - An array of integers representing the values of the rolled dice.
      straight - - 1 for small straight, 2 for large straight.
      Returns:
      The score for the straight if found, 0 otherwise.

    • checkYahtzee

      private int checkYahtzee(int[] dice)
      Checks if all dice have the same value (Yahtzee).
      Parameters:
      dice - - An array of integers representing the values of the rolled dice.
      Returns:
      50 if it's a Yahtzee, 0 otherwise.
